description.value: An extension to provide an indicator of the exectution of a double check prior to the administration of certain medication.

purpose.value: This extension represents DoubleCheckPerformed of zib [MedicationAdministration2 v1.1.1 (2020EN)](https://zibs.nl/wiki/MedicationAdministration2-v1.1.1(2020EN))

definition.value: Was a double check performed prior to the administration? This is only legally required for certain medication.

comment.value: MedicationAdministration has another way to capture that a double check has been performed, namely by marking a performer as _verfier_. Therefore, if a `performer.actor` exists + `performer.function` = _verifier_ then DoubleCheckPerformed may be assumed _true_.
